justification: The candidate has co-founded DRIPSTERZ, indicating entrepreneurial experience, which showcases leadership.
Managed end-to-end client relationships and increasing pre-acquisition client satisfaction by 20% shows relevant client relationship management experience.
Multiple projects related to marketing and sales demonstrate relevant experience in the field, although lacking specific mention of SEO.

requirements.criteria: Proven track record in sales and client relationship management
3+ years of experience in SEO and digital marketing
Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills
Master's degree in Business Administration or related field
Proficiency in Microsoft Office and CRM systems

input.job_description:
## Job Title: Sales and SEO Management Specialist  

### Location: Lahore, Pakistan  

### Company: Innovate Digital Solutions Inc.  

### Job Summary:  
Join Innovate Digital Solutions Inc. as a Sales and SEO Management Specialist. You will be part of a dynamic team responsible for driving client engagement and ensuring optimal performance in digital marketing strategies. Your role will include managing client relationships, improving SEO strategies, and leading your team to achieve sales targets.  

### Key Responsibilities:  
- Proactively engage with prospective clients to understand their business needs and provide innovative solutions.  
- Design and execute SEO strategies in alignment with client’s marketing objectives.  
- Manage and optimize PPC campaigns to maximize ROI and brand visibility.  
- Develop and maintain strong client relationships through tailored marketing solutions.  
- Lead a team to achieve and surpass sales targets while providing exceptional customer service.  
- Analyze market trends and algorithms to tailor SEO strategies accordingly.  
- Produce reports that track progress and measure success against KPIs.  

### Ideal Candidate Profile:  
You are a skilled sales and marketing professional with strong analytical skills suited to identifying and executing SEO opportunities. You excel at client interactions, possessing the ability to transform potential leads into satisfied clients through strategic and well-executed marketing initiatives. Leadership and team management skills will be pivotal to drive sales and motivate your team.  

### Benefits:  
- Competitive salary package  
- Health and wellness benefits  
- Performance bonuses  
- Opportunities for career advancement  

Join us to redefine digital engagement and lead market strategies with agility and innovation.
input.additional_info: Innovate Digital Solutions Inc. prefers candidates from reputable institutions such as [University of Lahore], [Punjab University]. Remote work options are available subject to roles and responsibilities. We assess skills through a combination of technical tests, interviews, and real-world problem-solving scenarios to gauge practical competency in strategic marketing contexts.
minimum_requirements: Proven track record in sales and client relationship management
3+ years of experience in SEO and digital marketing
Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills
Master's degree in Business Administration or related field
Proficiency in Microsoft Office and CRM systems

Ali Rehman Bhutta  
+923451030599  | 23110213@lums.edu.pk  | https://www.linkedin.com/in/alirehmanbhutta/  
EDUCATION  
Lahore University of Management Sciences                                                     
BSc (Honors) in Management Science            
- Key Courses: Integrated Marketing Communication , Supply Chain Management , Operation Management , Strategic 
Business Management , Sales Force Management , Business Ana lytics , Consumer Behavior . 
University of Baltistan  (UOBS)                                                                                                                            
Summer Exchange Semester  
• Course: Introduction to E -commerce  
Intermediate (FSc.)  – Pre-Engineering                                                                                  
• Engineering Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry  
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
DRIPSTERZ  – Co-Founder                                                                                                                                                                       Oct 20 22 – Feb 2023  
• Co-founded a preloved premium -quality sneakers brand  named DRIPSTERZ , taking a proactive approach to make fashion 
and quality accessible to everyone.  
• Streamlined the supply chain and established partnerships with 10 suppliers, procuring 400 unique pairs of premium 
sneakers within the first two months of operations.  
• Boosted sales by 30% through effective utilization of social media channels, leveraging targeted strategies to engage with 
the target audience.  
Retail E -Commerce Venture (REV)  – Business  Development Intern                                                                           May  2022 – June  2022  
• Managed end to end client relationships and increased pre -acquisition client satisfaction by 20% through effective 
stakeholder management and engagement practices.  
• Developed the optimal customer journey map for the marketing function to increase flexibility of the marketing 
engagement strategy leading to a 25% increase in lead generation and 5% increase in client acquisition.  
Independent Marketing & Sales Consultant  – E-Commerce Centric                                  Sep 20 20 – Mar 2023  
• Increased average sales  by 20%  for a retail focused e -commerce client by providing end to end  solutions on demand & 
supply planning, operations management, and driving product sales.   
• Helped my clients find new products, managed social media advertisements, and created stores which later scaled to more 
than $20,000 individually.  
•  Automated company operations for 4 clients impr oving task completion rates by 60% by partnering up with Trello, Slack, 
and click funnel software .  
• Improved the store conversion  rate to 4% (1-2 % aver age) by taking a customer centric approach – using google analytics 
and A/B testing on optimized product portfolio of the store.   
LEADERSHIP EXPERIENCE  
Sahara Foundation  - Co-Founder                                                                                                                                      Jun 2020 – Present  
• Sahara is an NGO aiming to bridge the gap between the poor and the rich.  
• Launched the foundation during the pandemic and distributed ration to more than 100 de serving families.  
• Raised 1.5 million PKR through developing marketing and sponsorships proposals increasing historical fund raising by 30%.  
LUMS Environmental Action Forum  (LEAF)  - Project Lead                                                                                     Oct 2022 – Mar 2023  
• Led two engagement teams for local SMEs by conducting product portfolio analysis and developing growth strategy 
bringing in 0.1 million in PKR for LEAF.  
Projects & Research Experience  
• EcoSprings - Marketing Campaign for Eco -friendly Water Bottles : Wrote a case study for product entry of an eco -friendly 
bottled water brand  named EcoSprings. Forecasted entry level demand using bass diffusion model and projected 
profitability for the next two m onths .  
• Stock Valuation - Honda Cars Pakistan : Projected the sales of Honda Cars Pakistan for the next five years based on its past 
variation with inflation, GDP growth, Exchange rate, and automobile industry growth. The insights were used for 
investment perspectives .  
SKILLS & PERSONAL  
Languages : Urdu  (native), English (fluent), Punjabi (native)  
IT: MS Office (Complete), Facebook Advertising, Digital Marketing, Power BI  – Intermediate , JIRA , SQL – Advanced . 
Interests : Hiking & Mountaineering, Folk Music,  Singing ( Hip-hop/Rap), Travelling

details.name: Ali Rehman Bhutta
details.executive_summary: Ali Rehman Bhutta is a dynamic entrepreneur and business development professional with a strong background in management science and e-commerce. He has co-founded a successful sneaker brand and has experience in enhancing client relationships and driving sales through innovative marketing strategies. His technical skills include proficiency in various software and tools essential for digital marketing and data analysis.
